item.title: Network Plus Course: Detection and Prevention Methods for Network Security
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Network Security" , "Cybersecurity" , "IT Training" , "Network Infrastructure" , "Data Protection" , "Physical Security" , "Security Awareness" , "Access Control" , "Motion Detection" , "Employee Training"

item.title: Biometric Authentication: Advancements, Use Cases, and Security Considerations in the Digital Age
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.description: Discover the latest advancements in biometric authentication technology, its diverse use cases, and the crucial security considerations for protecting sensitive data.
